headline: Eversource Completes Greater Boston and New Hampshire Solution Suite of Transmission Projects with Energization of Sudbury to Hudson Transmission Line
summary: BOSTON, January 13, 2025--Eversource today announced the energization of the Sudbury to Hudson Transmission Reliability Project, which marks the completion of Eversource and National Grid’s Greater Boston and New Hampshire Solution to strengthen the resiliency of the region’s electric transmission system against extreme weather and improve reliability for customers. Sudbury to Hudson in eastern Massachusetts was the final project completed in a suite of 50 projects included in the broader region

Sudbury to Hudson in eastern Massachusetts was the final project completed in a suite of 50 projects included in the broader region
